#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    long long n,ans ;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        if(n%2==1)
        {
            ans=((n/2)*(n/2+1))/2;
            ans*=2;
        }
        else{
            n--;
            ans=((n/2)*(n/2+1))/2;
            ans*=2;
            ans+=(n+1)/2;
        }
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
